revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:User:F-'''''amilcom'''''}}
'''Familcom'''

{{DISPLAYTITLE:User:F-'''''amilcom'''''}}
'''Familcom'''

{{Short description|Minister of Social and Family Development Maldives}} {{Infobox officeholder |name = Aishath Shiham |image = [[File:Dr._Aishath_Shiham_portrait.jpg|thumb|right]] |alt = |caption = Minister of Social and Family Development |order = |office = Minister of Social and Family Development |President = [[Mohamed Muizzu]] |predecessor = |successor = |term_start = 17 November 2023 |term_end = |birth_date = |birth_place = [[Malé]] |death_date = |death_place = |restingplace = |restingplacecoordinates = |birthname = |nationality = [[Maldives]] |party = [[People's National Congress (Maldives)]] |spouse = |relations = |children = |residence = |alma_mater = [[Newcastle University]][[United Kingdom]] |occupation = |profession = |cabinet = [[Cabinet of the Maldives]] |committees = |portfolio = |signature = |signature_alt = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Aishath Shiham''' (Dhivehi: އައިޝަތު ޝިހާމް; (Born: 19??) is the Minister of Social and Family Development in the [[Maldives]].<ref>{{cite web |title=Dr.Aishath Shiham Minister of gender social family devolopment |url=https://presidency.gov.mv/Government/Official/376?lid=16|access-date=17 November 2023 |date=17 November 2023}}</ref>She was formerly the [[Ministry of Education (Maldives)|Minister of Education]] from 2013 to 2018 as part of the [[Abdulla Yameen]] government.<ref>{{cite web |title=Dr Aishath Shiham has been appointed as the Minister of Education |url=https://www.moe.gov.mv/en/article/view/57/Dr-Aishath-Shiham-has-been-appointed-as-the-Minister-of-Education |access-date=17 November 2013 |date=17 November 2013}}</ref>

{{Short description|Minister of Social and Family Development Maldives}} {{Infobox officeholder |name = Aishath Shiham |image = [[File:Dr._Aishath_Shiham_portrait.jpg|thumb|right]] |alt = |caption = Minister of Social and Family Development |order = |office = Minister of Social and Family Development |President = [[Mohamed Muizzu]] |predecessor = |successor = |term_start = 17 November 2023 |term_end = |birth_date = |birth_place = [[Malé]] |death_date = |death_place = |restingplace = |restingplacecoordinates = |birthname = |nationality = [[Maldives]] |party = [[People's National Congress (Maldives)]] |spouse = |relations = |children = |residence = |alma_mater = [[Newcastle University]][[United Kingdom]] |occupation = |profession = |cabinet = [[Cabinet of the Maldives]] |committees = |portfolio = |signature = |signature_alt = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Aishath Shiham''' (Dhivehi: އައިޝަތު ޝިހާމް; (Born: 19??) is the Minister of Social and Family Development in the [[Maldives]].<ref>{{cite web |title=Dr.Aishath Shiham Minister of gender social family devolopment |url=https://presidency.gov.mv/Government/Official/376?lid=16|access-date=17 November 2023 |date=17 November 2023}}</ref>She was formerly the [[Ministry of Education (Maldives)|Minister of Education]] from 2013 to 2018 as part of the [[Abdulla Yameen]] government.<ref>{{cite web |title=Dr Aishath Shiham has been appointed as the Minister of Education |url=https://www.moe.gov.mv/en/article/view/57/Dr-Aishath-Shiham-has-been-appointed-as-the-Minister-of-Education |access-date=17 November 2013 |date=17 November 2013}}</ref>

revision.comment: Protected "[[Aishath Shiham]]": This article has been repeatedly move to different namespaces again and again. ([Move=Require extended confirmed access] (expires 07:04, 30 November 2023 (UTC)))
